Browse the source code of netbsd/external/gpl2/gettext/dist/gettext-tools/gnulib-lib/c-ctype.h

1/* Character handling in C locale.
2
3 These functions work like the corresponding functions in <ctype.h>,
4 except that they have the C (POSIX) locale hardwired, whereas the
5 <ctype.h> functions' behaviour depends on the current locale set via
6 setlocale.
7
8 Copyright (C) 2000-2003, 2006 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
9
10This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
11it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
12the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or
13(at your option) any later version.
14
15This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
16but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
17MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
18GNU General Public License for more details.
19
20You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
21along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
22Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. */
23
24#ifndef C_CTYPE_H
25#define C_CTYPE_H
26
27#include <stdbool.h>
28
29
30/* The functions defined in this file assume the "C" locale and a character
31 set without diacritics (ASCII-US or EBCDIC-US or something like that).
32 Even if the "C" locale on a particular system is an extension of the ASCII
33 character set (like on BeOS, where it is UTF-8, or on AmigaOS, where it
34 is ISO-8859-1), the functions in this file recognize only the ASCII
35 characters. */
36
37
38/* Check whether the ASCII optimizations apply. */
39
40/* ANSI C89 (and ISO C99 5.2.1.3 too) already guarantees that
41 '0', '1', ..., '9' have consecutive integer values. */
42#define C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_DIGITS 1
43
44#if ('A' <= 'Z') \
45 && ('A' + 1 == 'B') && ('B' + 1 == 'C') && ('C' + 1 == 'D') \
46 && ('D' + 1 == 'E') && ('E' + 1 == 'F') && ('F' + 1 == 'G') \
47 && ('G' + 1 == 'H') && ('H' + 1 == 'I') && ('I' + 1 == 'J') \
48 && ('J' + 1 == 'K') && ('K' + 1 == 'L') && ('L' + 1 == 'M') \
49 && ('M' + 1 == 'N') && ('N' + 1 == 'O') && ('O' + 1 == 'P') \
50 && ('P' + 1 == 'Q') && ('Q' + 1 == 'R') && ('R' + 1 == 'S') \
51 && ('S' + 1 == 'T') && ('T' + 1 == 'U') && ('U' + 1 == 'V') \
52 && ('V' + 1 == 'W') && ('W' + 1 == 'X') && ('X' + 1 == 'Y') \
53 && ('Y' + 1 == 'Z')
54#define C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_UPPERCASE 1
55#endif
56
57#if ('a' <= 'z') \
58 && ('a' + 1 == 'b') && ('b' + 1 == 'c') && ('c' + 1 == 'd') \
59 && ('d' + 1 == 'e') && ('e' + 1 == 'f') && ('f' + 1 == 'g') \
60 && ('g' + 1 == 'h') && ('h' + 1 == 'i') && ('i' + 1 == 'j') \
61 && ('j' + 1 == 'k') && ('k' + 1 == 'l') && ('l' + 1 == 'm') \
62 && ('m' + 1 == 'n') && ('n' + 1 == 'o') && ('o' + 1 == 'p') \
63 && ('p' + 1 == 'q') && ('q' + 1 == 'r') && ('r' + 1 == 's') \
64 && ('s' + 1 == 't') && ('t' + 1 == 'u') && ('u' + 1 == 'v') \
65 && ('v' + 1 == 'w') && ('w' + 1 == 'x') && ('x' + 1 == 'y') \
66 && ('y' + 1 == 'z')
67#define C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_LOWERCASE 1
68#endif
69
70#if (' ' == 32) && ('!' == 33) && ('"' == 34) && ('#' == 35) \
71 && ('%' == 37) && ('&' == 38) && ('\'' == 39) && ('(' == 40) \
72 && (')' == 41) && ('*' == 42) && ('+' == 43) && (',' == 44) \
73 && ('-' == 45) && ('.' == 46) && ('/' == 47) && ('0' == 48) \
74 && ('1' == 49) && ('2' == 50) && ('3' == 51) && ('4' == 52) \
75 && ('5' == 53) && ('6' == 54) && ('7' == 55) && ('8' == 56) \
76 && ('9' == 57) && (':' == 58) && (';' == 59) && ('<' == 60) \
77 && ('=' == 61) && ('>' == 62) && ('?' == 63) && ('A' == 65) \
78 && ('B' == 66) && ('C' == 67) && ('D' == 68) && ('E' == 69) \
79 && ('F' == 70) && ('G' == 71) && ('H' == 72) && ('I' == 73) \
80 && ('J' == 74) && ('K' == 75) && ('L' == 76) && ('M' == 77) \
81 && ('N' == 78) && ('O' == 79) && ('P' == 80) && ('Q' == 81) \
82 && ('R' == 82) && ('S' == 83) && ('T' == 84) && ('U' == 85) \
83 && ('V' == 86) && ('W' == 87) && ('X' == 88) && ('Y' == 89) \
84 && ('Z' == 90) && ('[' == 91) && ('\\' == 92) && (']' == 93) \
85 && ('^' == 94) && ('_' == 95) && ('a' == 97) && ('b' == 98) \
86 && ('c' == 99) && ('d' == 100) && ('e' == 101) && ('f' == 102) \
87 && ('g' == 103) && ('h' == 104) && ('i' == 105) && ('j' == 106) \
88 && ('k' == 107) && ('l' == 108) && ('m' == 109) && ('n' == 110) \
89 && ('o' == 111) && ('p' == 112) && ('q' == 113) && ('r' == 114) \
90 && ('s' == 115) && ('t' == 116) && ('u' == 117) && ('v' == 118) \
91 && ('w' == 119) && ('x' == 120) && ('y' == 121) && ('z' == 122) \
92 && ('{' == 123) && ('|' == 124) && ('}' == 125) && ('~' == 126)
93/* The character set is ASCII or one of its variants or extensions, not EBCDIC.
94 Testing the value of '\n' and '\r' is not relevant. */
95#define C_CTYPE_ASCII 1
96#endif
97
98
99/* Function declarations. */
100
101extern bool c_isascii (int c); /* not locale dependent */
102
103extern bool c_isalnum (int c);
104extern bool c_isalpha (int c);
105extern bool c_isblank (int c);
106extern bool c_iscntrl (int c);
107extern bool c_isdigit (int c);
108extern bool c_islower (int c);
109extern bool c_isgraph (int c);
110extern bool c_isprint (int c);
111extern bool c_ispunct (int c);
112extern bool c_isspace (int c);
113extern bool c_isupper (int c);
114extern bool c_isxdigit (int c);
115
116extern int c_tolower (int c);
117extern int c_toupper (int c);
118
119
120#if defined __GNUC__ && defined __OPTIMIZE__ && !defined __OPTIMIZE_SIZE__ && !defined NO_C_CTYPE_MACROS
121
122/* ASCII optimizations. */
123
124#undef c_isascii
125#define c_isascii(c) \
126 ({ int __c = (c); \
127 (__c >= 0x00 && __c <= 0x7f); \
128 })
129
130#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_DIGITS \
131 && C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_UPPERCASE && C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_LOWERCASE
132#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
133#undef c_isalnum
134#define c_isalnum(c) \
135 ({ int __c = (c); \
136 ((__c >= '0' && __c <= '9') \
137 || ((__c & ~0x20) >= 'A' && (__c & ~0x20) <= 'Z')); \
138 })
139#else
140#undef c_isalnum
141#define c_isalnum(c) \
142 ({ int __c = (c); \
143 ((__c >= '0' && __c <= '9') \
144 || (__c >= 'A' && __c <= 'Z') \
145 || (__c >= 'a' && __c <= 'z')); \
146 })
147#endif
148#endif
149
150#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_UPPERCASE && C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_LOWERCASE
151#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
152#undef c_isalpha
153#define c_isalpha(c) \
154 ({ int __c = (c); \
155 ((__c & ~0x20) >= 'A' && (__c & ~0x20) <= 'Z'); \
156 })
157#else
158#undef c_isalpha
159#define c_isalpha(c) \
160 ({ int __c = (c); \
161 ((__c >= 'A' && __c <= 'Z') || (__c >= 'a' && __c <= 'z')); \
162 })
163#endif
164#endif
165
166#undef c_isblank
167#define c_isblank(c) \
168 ({ int __c = (c); \
169 (__c == ' ' || __c == '\t'); \
170 })
171
172#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
173#undef c_iscntrl
174#define c_iscntrl(c) \
175 ({ int __c = (c); \
176 ((__c & ~0x1f) == 0 || __c == 0x7f); \
177 })
178#endif
179
180#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_DIGITS
181#undef c_isdigit
182#define c_isdigit(c) \
183 ({ int __c = (c); \
184 (__c >= '0' && __c <= '9'); \
185 })
186#endif
187
188#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_LOWERCASE
189#undef c_islower
190#define c_islower(c) \
191 ({ int __c = (c); \
192 (__c >= 'a' && __c <= 'z'); \
193 })
194#endif
195
196#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
197#undef c_isgraph
198#define c_isgraph(c) \
199 ({ int __c = (c); \
200 (__c >= '!' && __c <= '~'); \
201 })
202#endif
203
204#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
205#undef c_isprint
206#define c_isprint(c) \
207 ({ int __c = (c); \
208 (__c >= ' ' && __c <= '~'); \
209 })
210#endif
211
212#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
213#undef c_ispunct
214#define c_ispunct(c) \
215 ({ int _c = (c); \
216 (c_isgraph (_c) && ! c_isalnum (_c)); \
217 })
218#endif
219
220#undef c_isspace
221#define c_isspace(c) \
222 ({ int __c = (c); \
223 (__c == ' ' || __c == '\t' \
224 || __c == '\n' || __c == '\v' || __c == '\f' || __c == '\r'); \
225 })
226
227#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_UPPERCASE
228#undef c_isupper
229#define c_isupper(c) \
230 ({ int __c = (c); \
231 (__c >= 'A' && __c <= 'Z'); \
232 })
233#endif
234
235#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_DIGITS \
236 && C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_UPPERCASE && C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_LOWERCASE
237#if C_CTYPE_ASCII
238#undef c_isxdigit
239#define c_isxdigit(c) \
240 ({ int __c = (c); \
241 ((__c >= '0' && __c <= '9') \
242 || ((__c & ~0x20) >= 'A' && (__c & ~0x20) <= 'F')); \
243 })
244#else
245#undef c_isxdigit
246#define c_isxdigit(c) \
247 ({ int __c = (c); \
248 ((__c >= '0' && __c <= '9') \
249 || (__c >= 'A' && __c <= 'F') \
250 || (__c >= 'a' && __c <= 'f')); \
251 })
252#endif
253#endif
254
255#if C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_UPPERCASE && C_CTYPE_CONSECUTIVE_LOWERCASE
256#undef c_tolower
257#define c_tolower(c) \
258 ({ int __c = (c); \
259 (__c >= 'A' && __c <= 'Z' ? __c - 'A' + 'a' : __c); \
260 })
261#undef c_toupper
262#define c_toupper(c) \
263 ({ int __c = (c); \
264 (__c >= 'a' && __c <= 'z' ? __c - 'a' + 'A' : __c); \
265 })
266#endif
267
268#endif /* optimizing for speed */
269
270#endif /* C_CTYPE_H */
271
